title.text: Empirical Study of Predictive Powers of Simple Attachment Schemes for Post-modifier Prepositional Phrases

abstractContent.text: Greg W hi t t em or e K at h l e en Fe r r a r a Electronic D at a S y st em s Corp.

Abstract This empirical study attempts to find answers to the question of how a natural language (henceforth NL) system could resolve attachment of preposi-tional phrases (henceforth PPs) by examining naturally occurring PP attachments in typed dialogue.

entities.text: resolve attachment of preposi-tional phrases (henceforth PPs)

abstractContent.text: Examination includes testing predictive powers of existing attachment theories against the data.
The result of this effort will bean algorithm for interpreting PP attachment.
